00038 #ifndef _PLT_MEDIA_BROWSER_H_
00039 #define _PLT_MEDIA_BROWSER_H_
00040 
00041 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 |   includes
00043 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 #include "PltCtrlPoint.h"
00045 #include "PltMediaItem.h"
00046 
00047 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 |   PLT_BrowseInfo
00049 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 typedef struct {
00055     NPT_String                   object_id;
00056     PLT_MediaObjectListReference items;
00057     NPT_UInt32                   nr;
00058     NPT_UInt32                   tm;
00059     NPT_UInt32                   uid;
00060 } PLT_BrowseInfo;
00061 
00062 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 |   PLT_MediaBrowserDelegate
00064 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 class PLT_MediaBrowserDelegate
00070 {
00071 public:
00072     virtual ~PLT_MediaBrowserDelegate() {}
00073     
00074     virtual bool OnMSAdded(PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */) { return true; }
00075     virtual void OnMSRemoved(PLT_DeviceDataReference& /* device */) {}
00076     virtual void OnMSStateVariablesChanged(
00077         PLT_Service*                  /*service*/, 
00078         NPT_List<PLT_StateVariable*>* /*vars*/) {}
00079 
00080     // ContentDirectory
00081     virtual void OnBrowseResult(
00082         NPT_Result               /*res*/, 
00083         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /*device*/, 
00084         PLT_BrowseInfo*          /*info*/, 
00085         void*                    /*userdata*/) {}
00086 
00087     virtual void OnSearchResult(
00088         NPT_Result               /*res*/, 
00089         PLT_DeviceDataReference& /*device*/, 
00090         PLT_BrowseInfo*          /*info*/, 
00091         void*                    /*userdata*/) {}
00092 };
00093 
00094 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 |   PLT_MediaBrowser
00096 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00100 class PLT_MediaBrowser : public PLT_CtrlPointListener
00101 {
00102 public:
00103     PLT_MediaBrowser(PLT_CtrlPointReference&   ctrl_point,
00104                      PLT_MediaBrowserDelegate* delegate = NULL);
00105     virtual ~PLT_MediaBrowser();
00106 
00107     // ContentDirectory service
00108     virtual NPT_Result Browse(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, 
00109                               const char*              object_id, 
00110                               NPT_UInt32               start_index,
00111                               NPT_UInt32               count = 30, // DLNA recommendations
00112                               bool                     browse_metadata = false,
00113                               const char*              filter = "dc:date,upnp:genre,res,res@duration,res@size,upnp:albumArtURI,upnp:originalTrackNumber,upnp:album,upnp:artist,upnp:author", // explicitely specify res otherwise WMP won't return a URL!
00114                               const char*              sort_criteria = "",
00115                               void*                    userdata = NULL);
00116 
00117     virtual NPT_Result Search(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, 
00118                               const char*              container_id,
00119                               const char*              search_criteria,
00120                               NPT_UInt32               start_index,
00121                               NPT_UInt32               count = 30, // DLNA recommendations
00122                               const char*              filter = "dc:date,upnp:genre,res,res@duration,res@size,upnp:albumArtURI,upnp:originalTrackNumber,upnp:album,upnp:artist,upnp:author", // explicitely specify res otherwise WMP won't return a URL!
00123                               void*                    userdata = NULL);
00124 
00125     // methods
00126     virtual const NPT_Lock<PLT_DeviceDataReferenceList>& GetMediaServers() { return m_MediaServers; }
00127     virtual NPT_Result FindServer(const char* uuid, PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);    
00128     virtual void SetDelegate(PLT_MediaBrowserDelegate* delegate) { m_Delegate = delegate; }
00129 
00130 protected:
00131     // PLT_CtrlPointListener methods
00132     virtual NPT_Result OnDeviceAdded(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00133     virtual NPT_Result OnDeviceRemoved(PLT_DeviceDataReference& device);
00134     virtual NPT_Result OnActionResponse(NPT_Result res, PLT_ActionReference& action, void* userdata);
00135     virtual NPT_Result OnEventNotify(PLT_Service* service, NPT_List<PLT_StateVariable*>* vars);
00136     
00137     // ContentDirectory service responses
00138     virtual NPT_Result OnBrowseResponse(NPT_Result               res, 
00139                                         PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, 
00140                                         PLT_ActionReference&     action, 
00141                                         void*                    userdata);
00142 
00143     virtual NPT_Result OnSearchResponse(NPT_Result               res, 
00144                                         PLT_DeviceDataReference& device, 
00145                                         PLT_ActionReference&     action, 
00146                                         void*                    userdata);
00147     
00148 protected:
00149     PLT_CtrlPointReference                m_CtrlPoint;
00150     PLT_MediaBrowserDelegate*             m_Delegate;
00151     NPT_Lock<PLT_DeviceDataReferenceList> m_MediaServers;
00152 };
